sqlReaderQuery.value:
@concat('SELECT 1
FROM [dwh].[STG_CUSTOMS_DEC] as SCD
WHERE 
(
try_convert(nvarchar(200), NULLIF([NotificationSender], '''')) IS NULL
OR try_convert(datetime, NULLIF([NotificationDate], '''')) IS NULL
OR try_convert(nvarchar(200), NULLIF([NotificationRef], '''')) IS NULL
OR try_convert(nvarchar(200), NULLIF([bolNumber], '''')) IS NULL
OR try_convert(nvarchar(200), NULLIF([declarationNo], '''')) IS NULL
OR try_convert(nvarchar(200), NULLIF([declarationStatus], '''')) IS NULL
OR try_convert(nvarchar(200), NULLIF([declarationType], '''')) IS NULL
OR NOT EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM dwh.STG_CUSTOMS_ITEM AS SCI WHERE sci.declarationNo=SCD.declarationNo)
)
AND [NotificationRef] = ','''',activity('Lookup1').output.firstRow.NotificationRef,'''')

activities.name: fileTransfer
activities.description: file transfering from upload container to processing container on data lake.

activities.name: fileTransfer
activities.description: file transfering from upload container to processing container on data lake.

sqlReaderQuery.value:
@concat('select CASE WHEN COUNT(*)=0 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END AS LKP from dwh.DWL_CR_TRANSACTION_TYPE T1 INNER JOIN DWH.DWL_ENTITY T2
ON T1.ID_COMPANY_ENTITY=T2.ID_ENTITY_ORG WHERE T1.ID_STATUS=1 AND T2.DS_ENTITY_CR = ','''',activity('LookupColumns').output.value[1],'''')
@concat('select CASE WHEN COUNT(*)=0 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END AS LKP from dwh.DWL_COMPANY T1 WHERE T1.DS_CRNUMBER= ','''',activity('LookupColumns').output.value[0].DS_FILENAME,'''')

source.sqlReaderQuery:
SELECT  [CompanyCR]
      ,[ITEMCODE]
      ,[BARCODE]
      ,[PRODUCTNAMEARABIC]
      ,[DESCRIPTIONARABIC]
      ,[PRODUCTNAMEENGLISH]
      ,[DESCRIPTIONENGLISH]
      ,[UNITITEMBARCODE]
      ,[NOOFUNITITEMS]
      ,[UNITWEIGHTSIZE]
      ,[UNITUOM]
      ,[PACKAGEUOM]
      ,[COSTPRICE]
      ,[SELLINGPRICE]
      ,[BRANDTRADEMARKENGLISH]
      ,[BRANDTRADEMARKARABIC]
      ,CASE
WHEN CHARINDEX(
'???',
CAST(JSON_VALUE(CONCAT('["', REPLACE(MOCIPRODUCTGROUP, ' - ', '","'), '"]'), '$[0]') AS varchar(500))
) > 0 THEN
CAST(JSON_VALUE(CONCAT('["', REPLACE(MOCIPRODUCTGROUP, ' - ', '","'), '"]'), '$[1]') AS varchar(500))
ELSE
CAST(JSON_VALUE(CONCAT('["', REPLACE(MOCIPRODUCTGROUP, ' - ', '","'), '"]'), '$[0]') AS varchar(500))
END [MOCIPRODUCTGROUP]
      ,[COUNTRYOFORAGENNAME]
      ,[COUNTRYOFORAGENISO]
      ,[HSCODE]
      ,[SUPPLIERCR]
      ,[SUPPLIERNAME]
      ,[CATEGORYLEVEL11]
      ,[CATEGORYLEVEL12]
      ,[CATEGORYLEVEL13]
      ,[CATEGORYLEVEL14]
      ,[WIDTH]
      ,[HEIGHT]
      ,[DEPTH]
      ,[ID_SK]
      ,[DS_FILENAME]
      ,[DT_FILETIME]
      ,[DT_CREATE]
      ,[DT_UPDATE]
  FROM [dwh].[STG_PRODUCTS_VALID]

sqlReaderQuery.value:
@concat('select CASE WHEN COUNT(*)=0 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END AS LKP from dwh.DWL_PRODUCTS T1 INNER JOIN DWH.DWL_ENTITY T2
ON T1.ID_COMPANY=T2.ID_ENTITY_ORG WHERE T2.DS_ENTITY_CR = ','''',activity('LookupColumns').output.value[0].CompanyCR,'''')

typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		ReleaseNotification as (Declaration as (ItemDetails as (Item as (countryOfOrigin as string, declaredValue as short, declaredValueQAR as short, foreignCurrency as string, hscode as integer, itemQuantity as boolean, itemQuantityUOM as string, netWeight as short, netWeightUOM as string)), SupervisorDetails as (Supervisor as (mobileNumber as string, name as string)[]), accountType as string, address as string, bolNumber as string, cargoManifestNumber as string, carrierName as string, clearingAgencyCR as short, clearingAgencyNameAR as string, clearingAgencyNameEng as string, companyName as string, companyNameAr as string, countryOfLoading as string, declarationNo as string, declarationStatus as string, declarationType as string, email as string, entryOrExitPortName as string, establishmentId as integer, exporterName as string, firstCountryOfLoading as string, importerName as string, masterBolOrAWBNumber as string, portOfLoading as string, portType as string, releaseOrderNumber as long, releasedDate as string, supplierCR as short, supplierCustomsCode as short, voyageOrFlightNumber as string), NotificationDate as string, NotificationRef as string, NotificationSender as string)
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	format: 'xml',
	fileSystem: 'input',
	fileName: 'dene.xml',
	nullValue: 'null',
	validationMode: 'xsd',
	namespaces: true,
	namespacePrefixes: ['https://dlsapsmsiidt001.blob.core.windows.net/input/dene.xsd'->'dene.xsd']) ~> source1
source1 foldDown(unroll(ReleaseNotification.Declaration.SupervisorDetails.Supervisor),
	mapColumn(
		NotificationSender = ReleaseNotification.NotificationSender,
		NotificationRef = ReleaseNotification.NotificationRef,
		NotificationDate = ReleaseNotification.NotificationDate,
		accountType = ReleaseNotification.Declaration.accountType,
		address = ReleaseNotification.Declaration.address,
		bolNumber = ReleaseNotification.Declaration.bolNumber,
		cargoManifestNumber = ReleaseNotification.Declaration.cargoManifestNumber,
		carrierName = ReleaseNotification.Declaration.carrierName,
		clearingAgencyCR = ReleaseNotification.Declaration.clearingAgencyCR,
		clearingAgencyNameAR = ReleaseNotification.Declaration.clearingAgencyNameAR,
		clearingAgencyNameEng = ReleaseNotification.Declaration.clearingAgencyNameEng,
		companyName = ReleaseNotification.Declaration.companyName,
		companyNameAr = ReleaseNotification.Declaration.companyNameAr,
		countryOfLoading = ReleaseNotification.Declaration.countryOfLoading,
		declarationNo = ReleaseNotification.Declaration.declarationNo,
		declarationStatus = ReleaseNotification.Declaration.declarationStatus,
		declarationType = ReleaseNotification.Declaration.declarationType,
		email = ReleaseNotification.Declaration.email,
		entryOrExitPortName = ReleaseNotification.Declaration.entryOrExitPortName,
		establishmentId = ReleaseNotification.Declaration.establishmentId,
		exporterName = ReleaseNotification.Declaration.exporterName,
		firstCountryOfLoading = ReleaseNotification.Declaration.firstCountryOfLoading,
		importerName = ReleaseNotification.Declaration.importerName,
		masterBolOrAWBNumber = ReleaseNotification.Declaration.masterBolOrAWBNumber,
		portOfLoading = ReleaseNotification.Declaration.portOfLoading,
		portType = ReleaseNotification.Declaration.portType,
		releaseOrderNumber = ReleaseNotification.Declaration.releaseOrderNumber,
		releasedDate = ReleaseNotification.Declaration.releasedDate,
		supplierCR = ReleaseNotification.Declaration.supplierCR,
		supplierCustomsCode = ReleaseNotification.Declaration.supplierCustomsCode,
		voyageOrFlightNumber = ReleaseNotification.Declaration.voyageOrFlightNumber,
		mobileNumber = ReleaseNotification.Declaration.SupervisorDetails.Supervisor.mobileNumber,
		name = ReleaseNotification.Declaration.SupervisorDetails.Supervisor.name,
		countryOfOrigin = ReleaseNotification.Declaration.ItemDetails.Item.countryOfOrigin,
		declaredValue = ReleaseNotification.Declaration.ItemDetails.Item.declaredValue,
		declaredValueQAR = ReleaseNotification.Declaration.ItemDetails.Item.declaredValueQAR,
		foreignCurrency = ReleaseNotification.Declaration.ItemDetails.Item.foreignCurrency,
		hscode = ReleaseNotification.Declaration.ItemDetails.Item.hscode,
		itemQuantity = ReleaseNotification.Declaration.ItemDetails.Item.itemQuantity,
		itemQuantityUOM = ReleaseNotification.Declaration.ItemDetails.Item.itemQuantityUOM,
		netWeight = ReleaseNotification.Declaration.ItemDetails.Item.netWeight,
		netWeightUOM = ReleaseNotification.Declaration.ItemDetails.Item.netWeightUOM
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: false,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: false) ~> Flatten1
Flatten1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	recreate:true,
	format: 'table',
	staged: false,
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError') ~> sink4

transformations.name: MapDrifted3
transformations.description: Creates an explicit mapping for each drifted column

typeProperties.script:
source(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	purgeFiles: true,
	wildcardPaths:['*_regtemp.csv']) ~> source1
source(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	format: 'query',
	store: 'synapseanalytics',
	query: 'SELECT\nDS_SUPPLIER_CR AS BRANCH_CR,\n\'Active\' AS BRANCH_STATUS,\nDS_SUPPLIER_CR AS MainCRNumber\nFROM [dwh].[DWL_CUSTOMS_DECLARATION] WHERE FLG_SUPPLIER_CHECK=1\nAND DS_SUPPLIER_CR IS NOT NULL',
	isolationLevel: 'NONE',
	staged: false) ~> source3
source1 derive(BRANCH_CR = toString(byName('BRANCH_CR')),
		BRANCH_STATUS = toString(byName('BRANCH_STATUS')),
		MainCRNumber = toString(byName('MainCRNumber'))) ~> MapDrifted3
MapDrifted3, source3 union(byName: true)~> Union1
Union1 filter(equalsIgnoreCase(BRANCH_STATUS,'Active')) ~> Filter1
Filter1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	format: 'delimited',
	fileSystem: 'stagingarea',
	columnDelimiter: ',',
	escapeChar: '\\',
	quoteChar: '\"',
	columnNamesAsHeader: true,
	partitionFileNames:['BSS_Source_CR_List.csv'],
	umask: 0022,
	preCommands: [],
	postCommands: [],
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> sink1

transformations.name: MapDrifted2
transformations.description: Creates an explicit mapping for each drifted column

transformations.name: MapDrifted3
transformations.description: Creates an explicit mapping for each drifted column

typeProperties.script:
source(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	purgeFiles: true,
	wildcardPaths:['*_registration.csv']) ~> source1
source(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	purgeFiles: true,
	wildcardPaths:['*_permit.csv']) ~> source2
source2 derive(CRNUMBER = toString(byName('CRNUMBER')),
		BRANCHNUMBER = toString(byName('BRANCHNUMBER')),
		COMPANY_ARB = toString(byName('COMPANY_ARB')),
		COMPANY_ENG = toString(byName('COMPANY_ENG')),
		MUNICIPALITY_NAME = toString(byName('MUNICIPALITY_NAME')),
		STREET_NUMBER = toString(byName('STREET_NUMBER')),
		STREET_NAME = toString(byName('STREET_NAME')),
		ZONE_NUMBER = toString(byName('ZONE_NUMBER')),
		ZONE_NAME = toString(byName('ZONE_NAME')),
		MANAGER_QID = toString(byName('MANAGER_QID')),
		MANAGER_NAME = toString(byName('MANAGER_NAME')),
		CRNumber_Key = toString(byName('CRNumber_Key'))) ~> MapDrifted2
source1 derive(POBox = toString(byName('POBox')),
		Telephone = toString(byName('Telephone')),
		MainCRNumber = toString(byName('MainCRNumber')),
		CRNumber = toString(byName('CRNumber'))) ~> MapDrifted3
MapDrifted3 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	format: 'delimited',
	fileSystem: 'stagingarea',
	columnDelimiter: ',',
	escapeChar: '\\',
	quoteChar: '\"',
	columnNamesAsHeader: true,
	partitionFileNames:['bss_all_register_data.csv'],
	umask: 0022,
	preCommands: [],
	postCommands: [],
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> sink1
MapDrifted2 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	input(
		BranchCR as string,
		Status as string,
		SourceFileName as string
	),
	format: 'delimited',
	fileSystem: 'stagingarea',
	columnDelimiter: ',',
	escapeChar: '\\',
	quoteChar: '\"',
	columnNamesAsHeader: true,
	partitionFileNames:['bss_all_permit_data.csv'],
	umask: 0022,
	preCommands: [],
	postCommands: [],
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> sink2

transformations.name: MapDrifted1
transformations.description: Creates an explicit mapping for each drifted column

transformations.name: MapDrifted2
transformations.description: Creates an explicit mapping for each drifted column

typeProperties.script:
source(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	purgeFiles: true,
	wildcardPaths:['bss_all_register_data.csv']) ~> source1
source(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	purgeFiles: true,
	wildcardPaths:['bss_all_permit_data.csv']) ~> source2
source1 derive(POBox = toString(byName('POBox')),
		Telephone = toString(byName('Telephone')),
		MainCRNumber = toString(byName('MainCRNumber')),
		CRNumber = toString(byName('CRNumber'))) ~> MapDrifted1
source2 derive(CRNUMBER = toString(byName('CRNUMBER')),
		BRANCHNUMBER = toString(byName('BRANCHNUMBER')),
		COMPANY_ARB = toString(byName('COMPANY_ARB')),
		COMPANY_ENG = toString(byName('COMPANY_ENG')),
		MUNICIPALITY_NAME = toString(byName('MUNICIPALITY_NAME')),
		STREET_NUMBER = toString(byName('STREET_NUMBER')),
		STREET_NAME = toString(byName('STREET_NAME')),
		ZONE_NUMBER = toString(byName('ZONE_NUMBER')),
		ZONE_NAME = toString(byName('ZONE_NAME')),
		MANAGER_QID = toString(byName('MANAGER_QID')),
		MANAGER_NAME = toString(byName('MANAGER_NAME')),
		CRNumber_Key = toString(byName('CRNumber_Key'))) ~> MapDrifted2
MapDrifted2, MapDrifted1 join(CRNumber_Key == MapDrifted1@CRNumber,
	joinType:'left',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> Join1
Join1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	input(
		MAIN_CRNUMBER as long,
		BRANCHNUMBER as integer,
		COMPANY_ARB as string,
		COMPANY_ENG as string,
		MUNICIPALITY_NAME as string,
		STREET_NUMBER as integer,
		STREET_NAME as string,
		ZONE_NUMBER as integer,
		ZONE_NAME as string,
		MANAGER_QID as long,
		MANAGER_NAME as string,
		POBox as integer,
		Telephone as string,
		CRNumber as string
	),
	format: 'table',
	store: 'synapseanalytics',
	schemaName: 'tmp',
	tableName: 'STG_BSS_DATA',
	insertable: true,
	updateable: false,
	deletable: false,
	upsertable: false,
	truncate: true,
	staged: true,
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError',
	mapColumn(
		MAIN_CRNUMBER = MapDrifted2@CRNUMBER,
		BRANCHNUMBER,
		COMPANY_ARB,
		COMPANY_ENG,
		MUNICIPALITY_NAME,
		STREET_NUMBER,
		STREET_NAME,
		ZONE_NUMBER,
		ZONE_NAME,
		MANAGER_QID,
		MANAGER_NAME,
		POBox,
		Telephone,
		CRNumber = MapDrifted1@CRNumber
	)) ~> sink1

parameters{
	fileName as string ('4')
}
source(output(
		{Transaction Date - تاريخ الحركة } as string,
		{Transaction Type Code - كود نوع الحركة} as string,
		{Item Code - كود الصنف} as string,
		{Item Barcode - باركود الصنف} as string,
		{Your Company CR# - رقم السجل التجارى للشركة} as string,
		{Other Entity CR# - رقم السجل التجارى للطرف الاخر} as string,
		{Company Store/Inventory Code - رقم المخزن } as string,
		{Quantity - الكمية} as string,
		{Selling Price per unit - سعر البيع للوحدة  -} as string,
		{Comon Referance No. -  رقم المرجع المشترك} as string,
		{Internal Transfer Number/Code - رقم التحويل الداخلي} as string,
		{Number of Consumer Invoices - عدد فواتير البيع للمستهلك} as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> processingCsv
processingCsv derive(STG_FILENAME = $fileName,
		STG_FILEDATE = left(toString(fromUTC(currentTimestamp(), 'Asia/Istanbul')),19),
		TRANSACTION_DATE = regexReplace({Transaction Date - تاريخ الحركة },'[^0-9a-zA-Z]+','')) ~> AddColumn
AddColumn keyGenerate(output(SK_ID_SUR as long),
	startAt: 1L) ~> SurrogateKey1
SurrogateKey1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: true,
	input(
		TRANSACTION_DATE as string,
		TRANSACTION_TYPE_CODE as string,
		ITEM_CODE as string,
		ITEM_BARCODE as string,
		YOUR_COMPANY_CR as string,
		OTHER_ENTITY_CR as string,
		COMPANY_STORE_INVENTORY_CODE as string,
		QUANTITY as string,
		SELLING_PRICE_PER_UNIT as string,
		COMMON_REFERANCE_NO as string,
		INTERNAL_TRANSFER_NUMBER_CODE as string,
		NUMBER_OF_CONSUMER_INVOICES as string,
		ID_SK as integer,
		DS_FILENAME as string,
		DT_FILETIME as timestamp
	),
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	staged: true,
	allowCopyCommand: true,
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	saveOrder: 1,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError',
	mapColumn(
		ID_YEARMONTHDAY = TRANSACTION_DATE,
		ID_TRANSACTION_TYPE = {Transaction Type Code - كود نوع الحركة},
		ID_ITEM_CODE = {Item Code - كود الصنف},
		ID_ITEM_BARCODE = {Item Barcode - باركود الصنف},
		ID_ENTITY_CR = {Your Company CR# - رقم السجل التجارى للشركة},
		ID_CUSTOMER_ENTITY_CR = {Other Entity CR# - رقم السجل التجارى للطرف الاخر},
		ID_COMPANY_STORE_CODE = {Company Store/Inventory Code - رقم المخزن },
		MT_QUANTITY = {Quantity - الكمية},
		MT_DISCOUNT_AMOUNT = {Selling Price per unit - سعر البيع للوحدة  -},
		ID_COMMON_REF_CODE = {Comon Referance No. -  رقم المرجع المشترك},
		ID_TRANSFER_CODE = {Internal Transfer Number/Code - رقم التحويل الداخلي},
		ID_INVOICE_NUMBER = {Number of Consumer Invoices - عدد فواتير البيع للمستهلك},
		SK_ID = SK_ID_SUR,
		STG_FILENAME,
		STG_FILETIME = STG_FILEDATE
	)) ~> stgTransactions

parameters{
	xmlfilename as string ('a')
}
source(output(
		ReleaseNotification as (Declaration as (ItemDetails as (Item as (countryOfOrigin as string, declaredValue as double, declaredValueQAR as double, foreignCurrency as string, hscode as integer, itemQuantity as double, itemQuantityUOM as string, netWeight as short, netWeightUOM as string)[]), SupervisorDetails as (Supervisor as (mobileNumber as long, name as string)[]), accountType as string, address as string, bolNumber as string, cargoManifestNumber as integer, carrierName as string, clearingAgencyCR as string, clearingAgencyNameAR as string, clearingAgencyNameEng as string, companyName as string, companyNameAr as string, countryOfLoading as string, declarationNo as string, declarationStatus as string, declarationType as string, email as string, entryOrExitPortName as string, establishmentId as integer, exporterName as string, firstCountryOfLoading as string, importerName as string, masterBolOrAWBNumber as string, portOfLoading as string, portType as string, releaseOrderNumber as long, releasedDate as string, supplierCR as short, supplierCustomsCode as string, voyageOrFlightNumber as string), NotificationDate as string, NotificationRef as string, NotificationSender as string)
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: true,
	validationMode: 'none',
	namespaces: false) ~> source1
source1 foldDown(unroll(ReleaseNotification.Declaration.SupervisorDetails.Supervisor, ReleaseNotification.Declaration.SupervisorDetails.Supervisor),
	mapColumn(
		mobileNumber = ReleaseNotification.Declaration.SupervisorDetails.Supervisor.mobileNumber,
		name = ReleaseNotification.Declaration.SupervisorDetails.Supervisor.name,
		declarationNo = ReleaseNotification.Declaration.declarationNo
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: false,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: false) ~> FlattenSupervisor
source1 foldDown(unroll(ReleaseNotification.Declaration.ItemDetails.Item, ReleaseNotification.Declaration.ItemDetails.Item),
	mapColumn(
		countryOfOrigin = ReleaseNotification.Declaration.ItemDetails.Item.countryOfOrigin,
		declaredValue = ReleaseNotification.Declaration.ItemDetails.Item.declaredValue,
		declaredValueQAR = ReleaseNotification.Declaration.ItemDetails.Item.declaredValueQAR,
		foreignCurrency = ReleaseNotification.Declaration.ItemDetails.Item.foreignCurrency,
		hscode = ReleaseNotification.Declaration.ItemDetails.Item.hscode,
		itemQuantity = ReleaseNotification.Declaration.ItemDetails.Item.itemQuantity,
		itemQuantityUOM = ReleaseNotification.Declaration.ItemDetails.Item.itemQuantityUOM,
		netWeight = ReleaseNotification.Declaration.ItemDetails.Item.netWeight,
		netWeightUOM = ReleaseNotification.Declaration.ItemDetails.Item.netWeightUOM,
		declarationNo = ReleaseNotification.Declaration.declarationNo
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> FlattenItem
source1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	staged: true,
	allowCopyCommand: true,
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError',
	mapColumn(
		NotificationSender = ReleaseNotification.NotificationSender,
		NotificationDate = ReleaseNotification.NotificationDate,
		NotificationRef = ReleaseNotification.NotificationRef,
		address = ReleaseNotification.Declaration.address,
		bolNumber = ReleaseNotification.Declaration.bolNumber,
		cargoManifestNumber = ReleaseNotification.Declaration.cargoManifestNumber,
		carrierName = ReleaseNotification.Declaration.carrierName,
		clearingAgencyCR = ReleaseNotification.Declaration.clearingAgencyCR,
		clearingAgencyNameAR = ReleaseNotification.Declaration.clearingAgencyNameAR,
		clearingAgencyNameEng = ReleaseNotification.Declaration.clearingAgencyNameEng,
		companyName = ReleaseNotification.Declaration.companyName,
		companyNameAr = ReleaseNotification.Declaration.companyNameAr,
		countryOfLoading = ReleaseNotification.Declaration.countryOfLoading,
		declarationNo = ReleaseNotification.Declaration.declarationNo,
		declarationStatus = ReleaseNotification.Declaration.declarationStatus,
		declarationType = ReleaseNotification.Declaration.declarationType,
		email = ReleaseNotification.Declaration.email,
		entryOrExitPortName = ReleaseNotification.Declaration.entryOrExitPortName,
		establishmentId = ReleaseNotification.Declaration.establishmentId,
		exporterName = ReleaseNotification.Declaration.exporterName,
		firstCountryOfLoading = ReleaseNotification.Declaration.firstCountryOfLoading,
		importerName = ReleaseNotification.Declaration.importerName,
		masterBolOrAWBNumber = ReleaseNotification.Declaration.masterBolOrAWBNumber,
		portOfLoading = ReleaseNotification.Declaration.portOfLoading,
		portType = ReleaseNotification.Declaration.portType,
		releaseOrderNumber = ReleaseNotification.Declaration.releaseOrderNumber,
		releasedDate = ReleaseNotification.Declaration.releasedDate,
		supplierCR = ReleaseNotification.Declaration.supplierCR,
		supplierCustomsCode = ReleaseNotification.Declaration.supplierCustomsCode,
		voyageOrFlightNumber = ReleaseNotification.Declaration.voyageOrFlightNumber,
		accountType = ReleaseNotification.Declaration.accountType
	)) ~> DECLARATION
FlattenItem sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	staged: true,
	allowCopyCommand: true,
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError',
	mapColumn(
		countryOfOrigin,
		declaredValue,
		declaredValueQAR,
		foreignCurrency,
		hscode,
		itemQuantity,
		itemQuantityUOM,
		netWeight,
		netWeightUOM,
		declarationNo
	)) ~> ITEM
FlattenSupervisor sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	staged: true,
	allowCopyCommand: true,
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError',
	mapColumn(
		mobileNumber,
		name,
		declarationNo
	)) ~> SUPERVISOR

parameters{
	xmlfilename as string ('a')
}
